title: Kaitlynn Carter stuns in burgundy spaghetti-strap dress at Rachel Zoe event
text:
Miley Cyrus' whirlwind summer romance with Kaitlynn Carter ended about two weeks.

In the last 24 hours, both starlets gave the impression that they have moved on from the relationship, when they were each spotted out with potential new suitors.

By Thursday night, Carter, who only publicly announced her split from husband Brody Jenner in August, made it a point to head out and show her support for Rachel Zoe and her -- Box of Style By Rachel Zoe Female Founders Dinner -- at The AllBright in West Hollywood.

Kaitlynn Carter attended the Box of Style By Rachel Zoe Female Founders Dinner at The AllBright in West Hollywood Thursday night

Carter, 31, absolutely stunned when she arrived for the event in a dark burgundy dress.

The spaghetti-strap design help showcase her toned upper-body and ample cleavage.

She rounded out her ensemble with open-toe heels and wore her blonde tresses long and flowing past her shoulders, with some soft waves and a part in the middle.

lovely: Carter, 31, stunned when she arrived for the event in a dark burgundy dress

Supportive: The Instagram sensation and blogger snuggled up next to Zoe for a sweet snap

Ladies night: Natural Glam COO Alexandra Amodio posed alongside Carter and Zoe

Helping with Zoe's seasonal promotion, the Instagram sensation and blogger posed for pictures next to the fashion designer's The 2019 fall edition of her Box Of Style.

The stylish package includes: a Dannijo Elisa Necklace, JJ Winters Ivy Leather Crossbody purse, Rachel Miriam Leather Card case, Shani Darden Texture Reform Gentle Resurfacing Serum and Marc Jacobs Beauty Enamored Hi-Shine Gloss Lip Lacquer.

While on the rooftop where the dinner was being held, Carter was also photographed with Zoe, along with Natural Glam COO Alexandra Amodio.

Shining star: Carter's spaghetti-strap dress showcase her toned body and ample cleavage

Moving fast: Carter hooked up with Cyrus shortly after her split from Brody Jenner; she is pictured with Natural Glam COO Alexandra Amodio

Carter's appearance at the event comes just hours after Cyrus was spotted out on a lunch date with Cody Simpson.

She and Simpson were first seen together during a trip to a grocery store, where an E! News insider claimed they shared a brief kiss.

Not long after, a fan filmed the pair while they were on intimate lunch date at the health food restaurant Backyard Bowls, that was posted on social media.

The two singers, who have been close friends for many years, have also been spotted out together in recent days having coffee and meals together.

On display: Carter and Cyrus flaunted their hot and heavy summer exploits on social media

History: Cyrus and Cody Simpson, who have been close friends for many years, reportedly shared a brief kiss during their Thursday together that also included an intimate lunch date

Fresh off the end of two recent relationships, Carter was seen sitting next to a mystery man after they left Warwick in Los Angeles with several friends Wednesday night.

The mystery man headed out separately from the social media star, but then the two sat cozily next to each other when they piled into their getaway vehicle.

The Cyrus-Carter brief union happened fast on the heels of the Wrecking Ball star's split from husband Liam Hemsworth, who filed for divorce after just eight months of marriage.
description: Kaitlynn Carter stunned in a burgundy spaghetti-strap dress at Rachel Zoe Box Of Style dinner... hours after ex-Miley Cyrus is spotted sharing a kiss with Cody Simpson on Thursday.
